revision.comment: removed [[Category:en:Hymenopterans]]; added [[Category:en:Sawflies and wood wasps]] using [[Help:Gadget-HotCat|HotCat]]
revision.text: ==English== ===Noun=== {{en-noun}} # {{lb|en|zoology}} Any [[sawfly]] in the [[family]] {{taxlink|Xyelidae|family}}. #* '''1993''', ''Memoirs of the Entomological Society of Canada'' #*: Like raphidiids, '''xyelids''' have the mesopleuron divided into an episternum and epimeron by a distinct mesopleural suture, but the suture is angled much more obliquely and the epimeron is much smaller than the episternum (Figs. 8-10). [[Category:en:Sawflies and wood wasps]]
